subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Perhaps nowhere does high school basketball zealotry surpass the rural fervor of the timber and railroad towns of Sabine Parish, where seven boys and five girls teams have won a state championship.
snippet: Perhaps nowhere does high school basketball zealotry surpass the rural fervor of the timber and railroad towns of Sabine Parish, where seven boys and five girls teams have won a state championship.
